mutants.code:
def calculate_minimal_trap_cost(n, c, a):
    ans = 1
    visited = [0] * (n + 1)
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        x = i
        while visited[x] == 0:
            visited[x] = i
            x = a[x - 1]
        if visited[x] != i:
            continue
        a_cycle = x
        min_cost = c[x - 1]
        while a[x - 1] != a_cycle:
            x = a[x - 1]
            min_cost = min(min_cost, c[x - 1])
        ans += min_cost
    return ans

        while a[x - 1] != a_cycle:

        ans += min_cost
    return ans
